result.execSummary:
The defendant Kirk J Urban was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct - County Ordinance. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Fine to be paid in full by 04-29-16 or 3 days in the Waukesha County Jail for failure to pay.
Previously posted bail was refunded to poster 07/16/15

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
District Attorney's Office Law Intern, Katrina Seipel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Jess Martinez by Atty. McMurray in court.   
Defendant Kirk J Urban did not appear.    

State moves to amend to a county ordinance of DC.
Defense has no objections.

Atty. Mcmurray enters a plea of No Contest to the amended charge on behalf of his client.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the amended charge.

Court orders the following:
Fine:  $267.50
Apply Bail.
Balance to be paid in full by:  04/29/16
Alternate: 3 Days in the Waukesha County Jail.

District Attorney's Office Law Intern, Kelly Pingel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Kirk J Urban in court with attorney Jess Martinez by Atty. McMurray.
Matter to remain on the trial calendar.
File not called on the record.
Filed by the State. Witness list attached.

Jury status hearing at 01-28-2016 10:00 am.
Jury trial - 12 person at 02-09-2016 08:30 am.

Defendant Kirk J Urban in court with attorney Jess Martinez by Atty. McMurray.
Defense requests the matter be scheduled for trial.
File not called on the record.
  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for February 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury status hearing scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Kirk J Urban in court with attorney Jess Martinez by Atty. Nick Martinez.
File not called on the record.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 10:30 am.

District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Kirk J Urban in court with attorney Jess Martinez by Atty. Dan McMurray.  Hearing scheduled for September 2, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Cash bail previously posted to be refunded to poster. Defendant to report current address.   Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant to have no contact with Tina G listed in the Criminal Complaint for the first 72 hours, contact after that shall be for placement of the children only.

Defendant Kirk J Urban in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Public Defender Intern Arial Rosenberg appears.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 10:00 am.
